name: Tumblr Image Width: No Rescaling (10px BETA)
description: Keeps all tumblr photoset images/gifs at their true size. No upscaling from 500px to 540px. No shrinking from 540px to 500px. Now with the old 10px margins between images. A slight change from my script here. (NOTE: all posts are now 552px wide to accommodate the padding)

user.name: fallensparrow
user.about: If there is an issue with any of my scripts, or you have a feature you'd like added, feel free to contact me. Messaging me through tumblr is the quickest way to reach me, but you can also contact me through the userstyles forums.

additional_info:
This is just a test version of the script. It was designed after I got several requests for a way to restore the original 10px padding between images in photosets, while still not stretching or shrinking any images.

Because of this, there are now variable margins at the far right and far left of a post. I know that this is not the most aesthetically appealing thing, but the posts must be this wide in order to allow for 10px spacing between triple wide photosets.
